job_details.Functieomschrijving: We are seeking a highly skilled Data Engineer with expertise in advanced analytics and a strong understanding of Generative AI (GenAI). In this role, you will design, develop, and optimize scalable data pipelines, integrate GenAI technologies into analytics workflows, and support the deployment of machine learning models. job_details.full_text:
Data Engineer - Advanced Analytics

We are seeking a highly skilled Data Engineer with expertise in advanced analytics and a strong understanding of Generative AI (GenAI). In this role, you will design, develop, and optimize scalable data pipelines, integrate GenAI technologies into analytics workflows, and support the deployment of machine learning models. You will collaborate closely with data scientists and cross-functional teams to ensure seamless data integration and drive innovation through cutting-edge AI solutions., Location StatementIBM wants you to bring your whole self to work and for you this might mean the ability to work flexibly. If you are interested in a flexible working pattern, please talk to our recruitment team to find out if this is possible in the current working environment.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes designing, developing, and optimizing data pipelines, integrating GenAI into analytics workflows, and supporting the deployment of machine learning models. While GenAI is mentioned, the core focus on data pipelines, advanced analytics, and supporting ML model deployment aligns more closely with the responsibilities of an ML Engineer, particularly the 'Data Engineering' and 'Modeling' aspects, rather than a primary focus on building user-facing GenAI applications.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'design, develop, and optimize scalable data pipelines' directly relates to the creation and maintenance of data infrastructure.
job_tasks.phrase: design, develop, and optimize scalable data pipelines

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'support the deployment of machine learning models' indicates involvement in the lifecycle of ML models, which falls under modeling.
job_tasks.phrase: support the deployment of machine learning models

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'integrate GenAI technologies into analytics workflows' suggests the application and integration of generative AI models within analytical processes.
job_tasks.phrase: integrate GenAI technologies into analytics workflows

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'collaborate closely with data scientists and cross-functional teams' highlights the need for effective teamwork and communication.
job_tasks.phrase: collaborate closely with data scientists and cross-functional teams

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'drive innovation through cutting-edge AI solutions' points to a proactive and innovative approach to work.
job_tasks.phrase: drive innovation through cutting-edge AI solutions

soft_skills.phrase: collaborate closely with data scientists and cross-functional teams
drive innovation through cutting-edge AI solutions
